items.value: IF drone_positions(1) = (%0 - 1 |-> %1 - 1) THEN IF drone_positions(1) = drone_positions(2) THEN "yellow" ELSE "blue" END ELSE IF drone_positions(2) = (%0 - 1 |-> %1 - 1) THEN "green" ELSE IF (%0 - 1 |-> %1 - 1) /: ran(visited) THEN "white" ELSE IF visited~(%0 - 1 |-> %1 - 1) = 1 THEN "aqua" ELSE IF visited~(%0 - 1 |-> %1 - 1) = 2 THEN "lime" ELSE "white" END END END END END
